00019 Symbol::Symbol()
00020 {

00022 Symbol::Symbol( const string&   nameIn,
00023                 const string&   synonymIn,
00024                 enum Ownership  ownerIn,
00025                 enum Access     accessIn,
00026                 enum ObjectType objectTypeIn,
00027                 valarray <enum Structure>&  structureIn,
00028                 const valarray<int>& dimIn )
00029 
00030 : name       ( nameIn ),
00031   synonym    ( synonymIn ),
00032   object_type( objectTypeIn ),
00033   structure  ( structureIn.size() ),
00034   access     ( accessIn ),
00035   owner      ( ownerIn )
00036 {
00037    if( dimIn.size() <= 0 )
00038      return;
00039    dimension.resize( dimIn.size() );
00040    dimension = dimIn;
00041    structure = structureIn;
00042 
00043    int n = dimension.size();
00044    assert( n > 0 );
00045    initial.resize( n );
00046    upper.resize( n );
00047    lower.resize( n );
00048    step.resize( n );
00049    fixed.resize( n );
00050 
00051    for( int i=0, len=0; i<n; i++ )
00052      {
00053        if( object_type == MATRIX )
00054      {
00055        if( structure[i] == TRIANGLE )
00056          {
00057            len = series( 1, 1, dimension[i] );
00058          }
00059        else if( structure[i] == FULL )
00060          {
00061            len = dimension[i] * dimension[i];
00062          }
00063        else
00064          {
00065            len = dimension[i];
00066          }
00067      }
00068        else
00069      {
00070        len = dimension[i];
00071      }
00072        initial[i].resize( len );
00073        upper[i].resize( len );
00074        lower[i].resize( len );
00075        step[i].resize( len );
00076        fixed[i].resize( len );
00077      }
00078 }

00080 Symbol::Symbol( const Symbol& right )
00081 : name       ( right.name ),
00082   synonym    ( right.synonym ),
00083   object_type( right.object_type ),
00084   structure  ( right.structure.size() ),
00085   access     ( right.access ),
00086   owner      ( right.owner )
00087 {
00088    if( right.dimension.size() <= 0 )
00089      return;
00090 
00091    dimension.resize( right.dimension.size() );
00092    dimension = right.dimension;
00093    structure = right.structure;
00094 
00095    int n = dimension.size();
00096    assert( n > 0 );
00097    initial.resize( n );
00098    upper.resize( n );
00099    lower.resize( n );
00100    step. resize( n );
00101    fixed.resize( n );
00102 
00103    for( int i=0, len=0; i<n; i++ )
00104      {
00105        if( object_type == MATRIX )
00106      {
00107        if( structure[i] == TRIANGLE )
00108          {
00109            len = series( 1, 1, dimension[i] );
00110          }
00111        else if( structure[i] == FULL )
00112          {
00113            len = dimension[i] * dimension[i];
00114          }
00115        else
00116          {
00117            len = dimension[i];
00118          }
00119      }
00120        else
00121      {
00122        len = dimension[i];
00123      }
00124        initial[i].resize( len );
00125        upper[i].resize( len );
00126        lower[i].resize( len );
00127        step [i].resize( len );
00128        fixed[i].resize( len );
00129 
00130        initial[i] = right.initial[i];
00131        upper[i]   = right.upper[i];
00132        lower[i]   = right.lower[i];
00133        step [i]   = right.step [i];
00134        fixed[i]   = right.fixed[i];
00135      }

00137 Symbol& Symbol::operator=( const Symbol& right )
00138 {
00139    name        = right.name;
00140    synonym     = right.synonym;
00141    object_type = right.object_type;
00142    structure.resize( right.structure.size() );
00143    structure   = right.structure;
00144    access      = right.access;
00145    owner       = right.owner;
00146 
00147    if( right.dimension.size() <= 0 )
00148      return *this;
00149 
00150    dimension.resize( right.dimension.size() );
00151    dimension = right.dimension;
00152 
00153    int n = dimension.size();
00154    assert( n > 0 );
00155    initial.resize( n );
00156    upper.resize( n );
00157    lower.resize( n );
00158    step. resize( n );
00159    fixed.resize( n );
00160 
00161    for( int i=0, len=0; i<n; i++ )
00162      {
00163        if( object_type == MATRIX )
00164      {
00165        if( structure[i] == TRIANGLE )
00166          {
00167            len = series( 1, 1, dimension[i] );
00168          }
00169        else if( structure[i] == FULL )
00170          {
00171            len = dimension[i] * dimension[i];
00172          }
00173        else
00174          {
00175            len = dimension[i];
00176          }
00177      }
00178        else
00179      {
00180        len = dimension[i];
00181      }
00182        initial[i].resize( len );
00183        upper[i].resize( len );
00184        lower[i].resize( len );
00185        step [i].resize( len );
00186        fixed[i].resize( len );
00187 
00188        initial[i] = right.initial[i];
00189        upper[i]   = right.upper[i];
00190        lower[i]   = right.lower[i];
00191        step [i]   = right.step[i];
00192        fixed[i]   = right.fixed[i];
00193      }
00194    return *this;
00195 }
00196 
00197 bool Symbol::operator==( const Symbol& right ) const
00198 {
00199   //
00200   // If both objects lack of the name, it means they are both empty.
00201   // The definition of *empty* Symbol object only requires 
00202   // the name field to be empty.
00203   //
00204   if( name == "" && right.name == "" )
00205     return true;
00206 
00207    if( name        != right.name )
00208      return false;
00209    if( synonym     != right.synonym )
00210      return false;
00211    if( object_type != right.object_type )
00212      return false;
00213    if( structure.size()   != right.structure.size() )
00214      return false;
00215    if( access      != right.access )
00216      return false;
00217    if( owner       != right.owner )
00218      return false;
00219    if( dimension.size() != right.dimension.size() )
00220      return false;
00221 
00222    int n = dimension.size();
00223    for( int i=0, len=0; i<n; i++ )
00224      {
00225        if( initial[i].size() != right.initial[i].size() )
00226      return false;
00227        if( upper[i].size() != right.upper[i].size() )
00228      return false;
00229        if( lower[i].size() != right.lower[i].size() )
00230      return false;
00231        if( step [i].size() != right.step [i].size() )
00232      return false;
00233        if( fixed[i].size() != right.fixed[i].size() )
00234      return false;
00235      }
00236    return true;
00237 }
00238 bool Symbol::operator!=( const Symbol& right ) const
00239 {
00240   return !(*this == right);
00241 }

00243 Symbol Symbol::createScalar( const string& var, enum Ownership owner, enum Access access )
00244 {
00245    valarray<enum Structure> st( 1 );
00246    st[0] = FULL;
00247    valarray<int> one( 1 );
00248    one[0] = 1;
00249    return Symbol( var, "", owner, access, SCALAR, st, one );
00250 }
00251 
00252 Symbol Symbol::createVector( const string& var, int veclen, enum Ownership ownerIn, enum Access accessIn )
00253 {
00254    valarray<enum Structure> st( 1 );
00255    st[0] = FULL;
00256    valarray<int> len( 1 );
00257    len[0] = veclen;
00258    return Symbol( var, "", ownerIn, accessIn, VECTOR, st, len );
00259 }

00261 Symbol Symbol::createSymmetricMatrix( const string& var, 
00262                    valarray<enum Structure>& mt, 
00263                    valarray<unsigned int>& matdim, 
00264                    enum Ownership ownerIn, 
00265                    enum Access accessIn )
00266 {
00267   //Revisit:  Dave.  had to cast valarray<unsigned int> to valarray<int>.
00268   // This is lame, but Symbol expects valarray<int>.
00269   valarray<int> dim( matdim.size() ) ;
00270   for(int i=0; i<matdim.size(); i++ )
00271       {
00272         dim[i] = (int)matdim[i];
00273       }
00274    return Symbol( var, "", ownerIn, accessIn, MATRIX, mt, dim );
00275 }
00276 Symbol Symbol::createLabel( const string& label, 
00277                             const string& alias,
00278                 const valarray<int>& N )
00279 {
00280   valarray<enum Structure> st( 1 );
00281   st[0] = FULL; 
00282   return Symbol( label, alias, DATASET, READONLY, VECTOR, st, N );
00283 }

00291 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& o, const Symbol& s )
00292 {
00293   o << "Symbol         : " << s.name << endl;
00294   o << "Symbol Type    : ";
00295   if( s.owner == Symbol::DATASET )
00296     {
00297       o << "data label" << endl;
00298       o << "Alias (if any) : " << s.synonym << endl;
00299       int n = s.initial.size();
00300       o << "#Data Subsets  : " << n << endl;
00301       for( int i=0; i<n; i++ )
00302     {
00303       int m = s.initial[i].size();
00304       o << "[" << i << "]" "{ ";
00305       for( int j=0; j<m; j++ )
00306         {
00307           if( j > 0 )
00308         o << ", ";
00309           o << s.initial[i][j];
00310         }
00311       o << " }" << endl;
00312     }
00313     }
00314   else if( s.owner == Symbol::USER ) // all scalars
00315     {
00316       o << "user defined" << endl;
00317     }
00318   else if( s.owner == Symbol::SYSTEM )
00319     {
00320       o << "System defined" << endl;
00321       int n = s.initial.size();
00322       o << "#Data Subsets  : " << n << endl;
00323       for( int i=0; i<n; i++ )
00324     {
00325       int m = s.initial[i].size();
00326       o << "[" << i << "]" "{ ";
00327       for( int j=0; j<m; j++ )
00328         {
00329           if( j > 0 )
00330         o << ", ";
00331           o << s.initial[i][j];
00332         }
00333       o << " }" << endl;
00334     }
00335     }
00336   else
00337     o << "unknown" << endl;
00338   
00339   o << "Object Type    : ";
00340   if( s.object_type == Symbol::SCALAR )
00341     {
00342       o << "scalar";
00343     }
00344   else if( s.object_type == Symbol::VECTOR )
00345     {
00346       int n=s.initial.size();
00347       o << (n>1? "vectors" : "vector" ) << " { ";
00348       for( int i=0; i<n; i++ )
00349     {
00350       if( i>0 )
00351         o << ", ";
00352       o << s.initial[i].size();
00353     }
00354       o << " }";
00355     }
00356   else if( s.object_type == Symbol::MATRIX )
00357     {
00358       int n= s.initial.size();
00359       o << (n>1? "matrices" : "matrix") << " { ";
00360       for( int i=0; i<n; i++ )
00361     {
00362       if( i > 0 )
00363         o << ", ";
00364       o << "(" << s.dimension[i] << " by " << s.dimension[i] << ")";
00365     }
00366       o << " }";
00367     }
00368   else
00369     o << "unknown";
00370   o << endl;
00371 
00372   o << "Data Structure : ";
00373   int n= s.structure.size();
00374   if( n > 1 )
00375     o << "block diagonal" << endl;;
00376   for (int i=0; i<n; i++ )
00377     {
00378       if( s.structure[i] == Symbol::FULL )
00379     o << "   full";
00380       else if( s.structure[i] == Symbol::TRIANGLE )
00381     o << "   triangle";
00382       else if( s.structure[i] == Symbol::DIAGONAL )
00383     o << "   diagonal";
00384       else
00385     o << "   unknown";
00386       o << endl;
00387     }
00388 
00389   o << "Access         : ";
00390   if( s.access == Symbol::READONLY )
00391     o << "read-only";
00392   else if( s.access == Symbol::READWRITE )
00393     o << "read & write";
00394   else
00395     o << "unknown";
00396   o << endl;
00397 
00398   o << "Ownership      : ";
00399   if( s.owner == Symbol::SYSTEM )
00400     o << "system";
00401   else if( s.owner == Symbol::USER )
00402     o << "user";
00403   else
00404     o << "unknown";
00405   o << endl;
00406 
00407   return o;
00408 }
